title: What can determine from electric field vector

content.prompt:
From the electric field vector at a point, one can determine which of the following?

  1. The direction of the electrostatic force on a test charge of known sign at that point

  2. The magnitude of the electrostatic force exerted per unit charge on a test charge at that point

  3. The electrostatic charge at that point

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
